entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is a person who is discussing her marriage to Bill with Mrs Weasley. She mentions that she has bites on her body but believes they will not affect Bill's love for her.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is Fleur's husband and the subject of their conversation. He is mentioned as someone who may be affected by Fleur's bites.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is a person who is having a conversation with Fleur about Bill and his potential reaction to her bites.

relationships.description: Fleur is married to Bill, as mentioned in the conversation between Fleur and Mrs Weasley.
Mrs Weasley is concerned about how Fleur's bites will affect her marriage to Bill.
